info.title: Course Final Project - Auction API
info.description: Complete API documentation for the online auction platform. This API supports product bidding, user authentication, messaging, and auction management.

winner_id.description: ID of the auction winner (null if ongoing)

is_auto_extend.description: Auto-extend auction if bid placed near end

current_bids.description: List of bids placed on this product

parent_id.description: Parent comment ID for nested comments

400.description: Invalid input or user already exists

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Field to sort by (e.g., end_date, price_current)

400.description: Invalid input or missing/invalid images (1-4 images required)

403.description: Forbidden - Only product seller can update
Forbidden - Only product seller can delete

userIdToBlock.description: ID of user to block from bidding

403.description: Forbidden - Only product seller can block bidders

content.example: Hello, are you interested in this product?
